title: Texas Baby
description: Clayton Creek ranch was the scene of a Texas-sizedengagement party—until a gate-crasher stunned everyonewith the news she was pregnant with Chase Clayton IV'schild. The "father-to-be" was the most astonished of all,since he'd never laid eyes on lovely Josie Whitford,much less taken her to bed.But he didn't have the heart to blame Josie for ruining theparty or embarrassing his fiancée—not after he realizedshe'd been tricked by a callous impostor. Now, workingwith Josie to track down the man using his name, Chasetries to ignore a new and even more shocking he about to marry the wrong woman?
author: Kathleen O'Brien
